Schema.short_description: Organized frameworks for structuring and understanding information.

Template.short_description: Standardized formats for organizing and presenting information.

Framework.short_description: Foundational structures that define schema organization.

Blueprint.short_description: Detailed plans for schema organization and implementation.

Architecture.short_description: Overall design and organization of schema systems.

Format.short_description: Standardized ways of structuring schema information.

Protocol.short_description: Rules and procedures for schema implementation.

Interface.short_description: Points of connection between schema components.

Component.short_description: Basic elements that make up schema structures.

Constraint.short_description: Limitations and rules within schema structures.

Extension.short_description: Additions or modifications to base schemas.

Registry.short_description: Collections of schema definitions and patterns.

Metadata.short_description: Information about schema structure and content.

Evolution.short_description: Patterns of schema development and change.
